summary.overall_findings: Based on 2 publicly available sources, Charter Communications' published materials address 2 of 7 evaluated responsible AI pillars. Transparency disclosures detail specific AI tools deployed, such as 'Agent Assist' and 'Summary AI', and their functionalities in customer service. Additionally, governance materials reference oversight by a specific role responsible for AI deployment. No qualifying public evidence was found for the majority of the 7 evaluated pillars.
